column3: str
Alphinaud hopes that you are ready to rejoin the main host.
Speak with the Alliance recruit.
Speak with M'naago.
Follow M'naago to Ala Ghiri.
Speak with the Alliance recruit.
Speak with the Alliance recruit.
Speak with M'naago.
Follow M'naago to Ala Ghiri.
Because I've got other skills! Need I remind you I'm one of the finest hunters this tribe has ever seen? And speak for yourself! I don't remember you being a master culinarian!
...How long has it been since we saw Father? Maybe Alphinaud and I ought to visit Sharlayan.
So if your mother's food is so good, why are you such a terrible cook? Honestly, you've got to get her to teach you the basics while we're here.
I trust you are well rested and refreshed, yes? Then let us return to the front.
The greater part of the Alliance forces should have advanced into the Peaks by now, but I expect we will pass many of our comrades on the road east.
There is a checkpoint along the way, as I recall, but we will need only to identify ourselves to the soldiers in order to pass.
Scions! A pleasure to have you with us again.
You'll be happy to hear we've taken Ala Ghiri, and have already begun fortifying it as our new base of operations in the Peaks. Give a shout to the lads as you pass, eh?
The imperials sure do like their towers, don't they?
My village─the one we visited with Meffrid─is far to the north. There's no easy way to get to it from here, though...
Through the pass and onward to the southeast, was it?
Well met, Sci─ Wait, where are the rest of you?
Everything appears to be in order. Very good, very good...
Enjoy your time with M'naago and her kin? Aye, that's what I want to hear. Too many soldiers forget the importance of time away from all this.
On behalf of the Elder Seedseer, I thank you for your swift and decisive action against the primal menace. We are not unaware of the danger it posed to our fair nation.
The imperials underestimated us once, and they paid dearly for it. They may not be so easily deceived next time─but if we cannot fool them, we will simply have to break them!
As you can see, this part of the Peaks is much higher than the northern reaches, hence why the imperials built Specula Imperatoris where they did.

See those three towers to the east? That's her. Sits right on the edge of a cliff, so attacking from the north is a fool's errand. From the south, on the other hand, she's no different from any other imperial installation.
You see now why Velodyna was so important, eh? Right, then. Come along─they're waiting for us in Ala Ghiri.
The settlement is remarkably intact. I see little evidence of fighting...
Ala Ghiri's famous for that giant crystal. Some say Rhalgr Himself put it there.
Ala Ghiri was once a hub of trade and commerce, as I recall, hence the need for a large central square.
Here we are. The new base of operations for the Alliance and the Resistance!
Ah, there you are!
Greetings, General. I see you have been quite busy in our absence.
Less than you may imagine. The imperials fled at our coming, and we took the village without a fight.
Your timing is impeccable. We were about to discuss our strategy to seize Specula Imperatoris.
Though we are fresh from the road, we should be glad to attend.
Good. Take a moment to gather yourselves, and join us when you are ready.
